### 264.丑数 II

#### 1.题目描述

<p>编写一个程序，找出第 <code>n</code> 个丑数。</p><br/><p>丑数就是只包含质因数&nbsp;<code>2, 3, 5</code> 的<strong>正整数</strong>。</p><br/><p><strong>示例:</strong></p><br/><pre><strong>输入:</strong> n = 10<br/><strong>输出:</strong> 12<br/><strong>解释: </strong><code>1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 12</code> 是前 10 个丑数。</pre><br/><p><strong>说明:&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;</p><br/><ol><br/>	<li><code>1</code>&nbsp;是丑数。</li><br/>	<li><code>n</code>&nbsp;<strong>不超过</strong>1690。</li><br/></ol><br/>

#### c答案

```c

int nthUglyNumber(int n) {
    int *u = (int*)malloc(sizeof(int) * n);
    u[0] = 1;
    
    int index2 = 0;
    int index3 = 0;
    int index5 = 0;
    
    int k = 1;
    
    while(k < n)
    {
        u[k] = min(u[index2]*2, u[index3]*3, u[index5]*5);
        if(u[index2]*2==u[k])
            index2++;
        if(u[index3]*3==u[k])
            index3++;
        if(u[index5]*5==u[k])
            index5++;
        k++;
    }
    return u[k-1];
}

int min(int a, int b,int c)
{
    return a>b?(b<c?b:c):(a<c?a:c);
    if(a < b && a < c)
        return a;
    if(b < a && b < c)
        return b;
    else
        return c;
}

```

#### c++答案

```c++

class Solution {
public:
    int nthUglyNumber(int n) {
        vector<int> dp;
        int p2=0;
        int p3=0;
        int p5=0;
        if (n==1){
            return 1;
        }
        dp.push_back(1);
        while (dp.size()<n){
            if ((2*dp[p2]<=3*dp[p3])&&(2*dp[p2]<=5*dp[p5])){
                dp.push_back(2*dp[p2]);
            }else if ((3*dp[p3]<=2*dp[p2])&&(3*dp[p3]<=5*dp[p5])){
                dp.push_back(3*dp[p3]);
            }else dp.push_back(5*dp[p5]);  
            //cout<<2*dp[p2]<<" "<<3*dp[p3]<<" "<<5*dp[p5]<<endl; 
            if (2*dp[p2]==dp[dp.size()-1]) p2++;
            if (3*dp[p3]==dp[dp.size()-1]) p3++;
            if (5*dp[p5]==dp[dp.size()-1]) p5++;
        }
     return dp[dp.size()-1];   
    }
};

```

#### java答案

```java

class Solution {
    public int nthUglyNumber(int n) {
        if (n==1){
            return 1;
        }

        /**
         * 下一个丑数如何产生：一定是之前的某个数*2 或者*3 或者*5得出的
         * 定义3个flag
         * 对应*2大于当前丑数的最小的那个数对应下标为two_flag
         * 对应*3大于当前丑数的最小的那个数对应下标为three_flag
         * 对应*5大于当前丑数的最小的那个数对应下标为five_flag
         *
         * 3个flag的初始值均为1，当前丑数求出后更新3个flag
         */
        int[] dp = new int[n+1];

        Arrays.fill(dp,1);
        int two_flag = 1;
        int three_flag = 1;
        int five_flag = 1;

        for (int i = 2; i < n+1; i++) {
            dp[i] = cur_choushu(dp[two_flag],dp[three_flag],dp[five_flag]);
            for (int j = two_flag; j <= i; j++) {
                if (dp[two_flag]*2<=dp[i]){
                    two_flag++;
                }else {
                    break;
                }
            }

            for (int j = three_flag; j <= i; j++) {
                if (dp[three_flag]*3<=dp[i]){
                    three_flag++;
                }else {
                    break;
                }
            }

            for (int j = five_flag; j <= i; j++) {
                if (dp[five_flag]*5<=dp[i]){
                    five_flag++;
                }else {
                    break;
                }
            }
        }

        return dp[n];
    }

    private int cur_choushu(int two_flag,int three_flag,int five_flag){
        int result = (two_flag*2<three_flag*3)?two_flag*2:three_flag*3;
        result = (result<five_flag*5)?result:five_flag*5;

        return result;
    }
}

```

#### JavaScript答案

```javascript


/**
 * @param {number} n
 * @return {number}
 */
var nthUglyNumber = function(n) {
    let uglyNums = [1];
    let i2 = 0, i3 = 0, i5 = 0;
    for (let i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        let n1 = uglyNums[i2] * 2;
        let n2 = uglyNums[i3] * 3;
        let n3 = uglyNums[i5] * 5;
        
        let num = Math.min(n1, Math.min(n2, n3));
        uglyNums.push(num);
        
        if (num === n1) i2++;
        if (num === n2) i3++;
        if (num === n3) i5++;
    }
    return uglyNums[n-1];
};



```

050312500,2066242608,2073600000,2097152000,2099520000,2109375000,2123366400};
    
```c#
    public int NthUglyNumber(int n) {
        return table[n];
    }
}

```

#### python2.x答案

```python

class Solution(object):
    def nthUglyNumber(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        res = [1]
        min2 = 0
        min3 = 0
        min5 = 0

        for i in range(n-1):

            num = min(res[min2]*2, res[min3]*3, res[min5]*5)
            res.append(num)

            while res[min2]*2 <= num:
                min2 += 1
            while res[min3]*3 <= num:
                min3 += 1
            while res[min5]*5 <= num:
                min5 += 1

        return res[-1]

```

#### python3.x答案

```python

class Solution:
    ugly = sorted(2**a * 3**b * 5**c for a in range(32) for b in range(20) for c in range(14))
    def nthUglyNumber(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        return self.ugly[n-1]

```

#### go答案

```go

func nthUglyNumber(n int) int {
    nums := make([]int, n+5)

    for k:=0;k<5;k++{
        nums[k] = k+1
    }
    
    if n == 0{
        return 0
    }
    
    if n< 5{
        return nums[n-1]
    }
    
    i := 5
    var v1,v2,v3 int
    for {
        if i >= n {
            break;
        }
        
        for j:=2;j<i;j++{
            if nums[j]*2 > nums[i-1]{
                v1 = nums[j]*2
                break
            }
        }
        
        for j:=2;j<i;j++{
            if nums[j]*3 > nums[i-1]{
                v2 = nums[j]*3
                break
            }
        }        
        
        for j:=2;j<i;j++{
            if nums[j]*5 > nums[i-1]{
                v3 = nums[j]*5
                break
            }
        }  
        
        if v1<= v2 && v1 <= v3{
            nums[i] =v1
        }else if v2<= v3 && v2 <= v1{
              nums[i] =v2
        }else{
             nums[i] =v3
        }  
        i++
    }
    
    return nums[n-1]
    
}

```
